titles.title: I SING PRAISES TO YOUR NAME OH LORD

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I sing praises to your name, oh Lord, praises to your name oh Lord
For your name is great and greatly to be praised
**
I sing holy is your name, oh Lord, holy is your name oh Lord
For your name is great and greatly to be praised

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(I sing worthy is your name...)
(We sing glory to your name..)
